description.value: This plug-in will alert when a new Windows Event Log Message is found.

property.label: Search Term
property.description: The search term obtained from the XML in windows event log.

property.label: SQL Server
property.description: The SQL Server to use for storage

property.label: SQL Username
property.description: The SQL Username to use for connection to the database.

property.label: SQL Password
property.description: The password for the SQL Username used to connect to the database.

metric.name: New Message
metric.description: If a new event log message is found this number will be 1, otherwise it will be 0.
